name: (a)i your bot
description:
Dodge the asteroids and help your bot become the best bot of all time!

Get coins and upgrade your bot!

Successfully!

Tip for the boss fight-

Take advantage of some bug (I'm sure there are many) and use it.

I didn't know the boss would be so hard and when I found out it was too late. Sorry.
